Welcome on Garance's webiste!

I'm Garance, this is the first draft of my blog. I'm a software engineer, focused on web development. I live in sunny Barcelona, I love that city!

Besides development, I love cooking, as well as reading. This webiste is meant to be a blog, an experimentation field, a hosting spot for different projects... Anything really!

You can find me on Twitter: @garanceVallat!
